row.column: Schedule Task Collateral Manager Config Level
Defined or user customized percent basis types.
Add the domain YES, Y, TRUE or T to round the FxRate based on the CurrencyPair Quote rounding value.
Workflow rules to check Collateral Management
List of Positions in the Margin Call Engine
Show Description of an product property in Collateral Exposure Trade Window
Show Button Bar in Collateral Exposure Trade Window
Define the product security code under which the increment lot size is set.
List of class name for custom concentration limit type.

Enter the statuses that should be processed by the scheduled task PROCESS_RECON_MSGS
Contains the ID of the default template to load the Margin Call Details report
Contains the ID of the default template to load the Margin Call Property template
Contains the ID of the default template to load the Margin Call Details Property template
If you set to true, and ORDERER_ROLE = Client, the Cash margin call will also be generated to a dedicated account, allowing separate interest payments.
If you set to true, and ORDERER_ROLE = Client, the Security margin call will also be generated to a dedicated account, allowing separate interest payments.
If you set to Include, client transfers will be included in the Margin Call position for this contract.
To set the role (client or customer) of the legal entity in case of USE_MARGIN_CALL_ACCOUNT and/or USE_SECURITY_MARGIN_CALL_ACCOUNT is set to true

The book name you define here - if it belongs to a child LE of the PO - will be available as a default book (in panel details > General Info > Book drop down). Otherwise, only books belonging to the PO appear there.
True to exclude interest on the SecLending trade from the margin calculation. False if you want the SecLending interest to be included. Default is false.
True to exclude interest on the Repo trade from the margin calculation. False if you want the SecLending interest to be included. Default is false.
If true, the related corporate action coupon trades will be included in the collateral valuation.

True if you want interest to be computed only based on frequency of date rule regardless of positive or negative MTM move. False if you want a compute interest based on frequency UNLESS there is a switch in the MTM move.
True if a dispute comment is mandatory when resolving a dispute false otherwise. Default is false.

For CFD MC contracts, if BOTH_MARGIN is true with negative variation margin (VM), NB will be negative. If BOTH_MARGIN is false with negative VM, NB will only show deposit annex (Initial Margin). With positive VM, NB will be positive.
True if Reconciliation will be used for this contract. False otherwise.

For CFD MC contracts, if NO_MARGIN is true, NB will show only deposit annex (initial margin). If it is false and variation margin is negative, NB will show only deposit annex. If variation margin is positive, NB will be positive.
For CFD margin call contracts. In RST define the legal entity (short name) the provider will pay the dividend to if the provider has a long position.
Ignore the ALLOW_EX_DIVIDEND pricing parameters during the bond evaluation
List all the source types possible
Position class of the default collateral pool
Position type of the default collateral pool
Date type of the default collateral pool
Movement type of the default collateral pool
Book of the default collateral pool
